about_the_game:
Welcome to Cozy Merge!




Welcome to Cozy Merge, a delightful and relaxing puzzle game set in a warm and inviting atmosphere. Inspired by the popular Japanese game Suika, Cozy Merge offers a unique blend of fun and simplicity, perfect for players of all ages.

Immerse yourself in a cozy room by the fireplace, where the snow gently falls outside. As you listen to soothing chill music from the in-game radio, you'll find yourself merging candies in a manner reminiscent of a physical Tetris-merge game. Combine the same candies to discover new and exciting treats. Can you merge your way to the ultimate prize - the donut?

Features:


Relaxing Gameplay: Enjoy a calm and serene environment where you can unwind and focus on merging candies without any stress.

Cozy Atmosphere: The game’s cozy room setting, complete with a fireplace and falling snow, creates a warm and inviting ambiance.

Chill Music: The in-game radio plays a selection of chill music tracks that perfectly complement the cozy environment, enhancing your gaming experience.

Simple and Fun: Easy-to-learn mechanics make Cozy Candy Merge accessible for everyone, while the challenge of merging candies keeps the gameplay engaging and enjoyable.

Discover New Treats: Combine the same candies to unlock new and exciting treats, each more delightful than the last.

Visual Appeal: Colorful and charming graphics make the game visually appealing and add to the overall sense of relaxation.

Whether you're looking to pass the time with a fun and engaging puzzle game or seeking a relaxing escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, Cozy Merge is the perfect game for you. Sit back, relax, and start merging those candies!
